job.title: Software Engineer III
job.description: ltstronggtltugtPosition Summary What Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWhat youll doltbrgtltligtltulgtImagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face Thats what we do at Walmart Global Tech Were a team of 15000 software engineers data scientists and service professionals within Walmart the worlds largest retailer delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 22 million associates To others innovation looks like an app service or some code but Walmart has always been about people People are why we innovate and people power our innovations ltemgtBeing human led is our true disruptionltbrgtltbrgtltemgtWere looking for a Software Engineer to join International Cart and Checkout team  Want to change how different countries shop online Then keep readingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout YoultbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtYou are a passionate backend engineer who loves to code You love to take ideas and build great serverside code with Java Spring and other frameworks You might like to talk about obscure computer science topics but really you just want to write simple code and ship new products and features to customers or improve existing onesltbrgtltbrgtYour focus is on backend distributed Java code which is readable performant supportable You are curious and are always ready to learn new things and solve hard problemsYou are passionate about code reviews and contribute towards high quality codeltbrgtltbrgtThings You will doltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtThat Said Here Are Some Things Youll DoltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtWalmart International is a diverse and fastgrowing business unit so youll get experience on many different projects across the organizationltbrgtltulgtltligt Build reusable artifacts which can be used across micro servicesltligtltligt Refactor or improve existing code We constantly find ways to improve all of our Java code and you are all aboardltligtltligt Work closely with our product design performant solutions for customersltligtltligt Demonstrate technical expertise in solving challenging programming and design problemsltligtltligt Share what you know and learn either oneonone or with lightning talks to the groupltligtltligt Work boldly with a sense of urgency embrace mistakes learn from them and drive the team toward successltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtMinimum Qualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years of experience in objectoriented design and JunitTestNG for unit testing application ltligtltligtSolid understanding of relational and nonrelational database technologies SQL and Cosmos DB data modeling and RESTful web APIs ltligtltligtFamiliar
